dmca.title: DMCA Violations.
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

 

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringement%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

 

 

________________________________

From: Ian Weyenberg [mailto:ian@eurorevenue.com] 
Sent: Friday, February 16, 2007 10:12 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: DMCA Violations.

 

To whom it may concern,

 

I would like to report DMCA violations on the follow domains which are all hosted on
lines terminating in your datacenter and hardware housed there as well. With the IP:
70.87.39.2

 

http://www.ggg-productions.com/

http://www.bukkake-attack.com/

http://www.sperm-beasts.com/

http://www.fucked-and-pissed.com/

http://www.piss-invasion.com/

http://www.extreme-sex-area.com/

 

As far as I can tell 100% of all photographs and videos used on these sites was
stolen from our content producers. We are the only person with rights to digitize
GGG Productions for the web, they have over 400 titles in public release, I can
include an entire list if youd like as we have not yet identified exactly which how
many of our videos they have used without permission, you can match the content with
our sites, which use it legally... www.germangoogirls.com
<http://www.germangoogirls.com/>  www.666bukkake.com <http://www.666bukkake.com/> 
www.extremebukkake.com <http://www.extremebukkake.com/>  www.gggsexbox.com
<http://www.gggsexbox.com/>  they have even gone as far as to watermark over the
original watermarkings that came on the DVDs they stole these videos from. Just to
get it started here is a list of titles...
